integration_patterns: Data ingestion and processing via AWS services

evidence.claim: Metrodora Institute utilizes AWS services for its cloud infrastructure.
The institute ensures HIPAA compliance for handling sensitive health information.
Integration capabilities include support for HL7 FHIR for healthcare data interoperability.
The company employs X12 transaction sets for its healthcare data exchange.
Utilizes AWS services like Lambda and S3 for data management and processing.

icp.icp_reason: Metrodora utilizes X12 EDI for healthcare data, aligning with target ICP.
